help.commands: set auto_payload,get auto_payload,add match_payload,remove match_payload,list_payload,add media_replace,remove media_replace,list media_replace,bind regex,unbind regex,bind filter,unbind filter,list bind regex,list bind filter,set match_mode,set match_option,set match_engine,Payload or File Path,Filter Name,Filter or Regex Name,Payload,File or URL,Regex Name,Bind Name,Match Engine,Match Option,Match Mode,cls,exit
help.cmd_set.auto_payload: Set a payload for the automatic content injection
help.cmd_get.auto_payload: Print the payload set to automatic content injection
help.cmd_add.match_payload: Assign payload to a filter or regex name
help.cmd_remove.match_payload: Remove a payload form beign associated with a filter or regex name
help.cmd_list_payload: List the current association of payloads with filter or regex names

cmd_add.media_replace.params: Filter or Regex Name,File or URL

help.cmd_add.media_replace: Associate a media file or link to a media file with a filter or regex name
help.cmd_remove.media_replace: Remove a media file or URL from beign associated with a filter or regex name
help.cmd_list.media_replace: List the association of media files, URLS with filter or regex names
help.cmd_bind.regex: Bind a valid regex group to a service with the specified name
help.cmd_unbind.regex: Unbind a valid regex group from a service
help.cmd_bind.filter: Bind a valid filter to service with the specified name
help.cmd_unbind.filter: Unbind a filter from a service
help.cmd_list.bind.regex: List the bound regex groups of a service
help.cmd_list.bind.filter: List the bound filters of a service
help.cmd_set.match_engine: Set the match engine for match injections
help.cmd_set.match_option: Set the matching option for match injections
help.cmd_set.match_mode: Set the match mode for match injections

p_Payload.or.File.Path.values: A payload written by hand in the input line,|,A file path with extension to the file (can be relative)

help.p_Payload.or.File.Path: Defines a valid payload, files get resolved to text after setting

p_Filter.or.Regex.Name.values: A valid Filter or Regex Group name

help.p_Filter.or.Regex.Name: Defines a valid filter or regex name which is used for filtering, conditional actions
help.p_Filter.Name: Defines a valid, existing filter name

p_Payload.values: A text written by hand to the input line

help.p_Payload: Defines a valid one-line payload for injection

p_File.or.URL.values: Path to an existing file with extension (can be relative),|,An URL to a media file (not web page) beginning with http:// or https:// or www.

help.p_File.or.URL: Defines a valid media source which gets resolved to array of bytes

p_Regex.Name.values: A valid name of a created regex group

help.p_Regex.Name: Defines a valid name of a regex group, used for conditional actions

p_Bind.Name.values: Any string name - the service may have preferenced names for some filters

help.p_Bind.Name: Defines a name for binding a filter or regex group to a service
help.p_Match.Engine: Defines a valid engine to use for filtering and conditional actions by the Injection Manager
help.p_Match.Option: Defines a valid option for checking the condition relations
help.p_Match.Mode: Defines a valid mode for the position of injecting the content, starting from the line the match was found in
